SELECTS.query: SELECT count(*) FROM public.invoice WHERE id in (SELECT id FROM public.invoice WHERE (data -> 'issuerDetails' ->> 'city' LIKE '%Brno'))

SELECT x.country, x.name FROM (SELECT data->'customerDetails'->>'country' as country, data->'customerDetails'->>'name' as name FROM public.invoice WHERE (data ->> 'includingTax')::boolean is true) as x group by x.country, x.name

SELECT x.cd, x.d FROM (SELECT data->'customerDetails' AS cd, data->'description' AS d, (json_array_elements(data->'description') ->> 'price')::int AS price FROM public.invoice) AS x WHERE x.price > 8500
SELECT count(*) FROM public.invoice_binary WHERE id in (SELECT id FROM public.invoice_binary WHERE (data -> 'issuerDetails' ->> 'city' LIKE '%Brno'))

SELECT x.country, x.name FROM (SELECT data->'customerDetails'->>'country' as country, data->'customerDetails'->>'name' as name FROM public.invoice_binary WHERE (data ->> 'includingTax')::boolean is true) as x group by x.country, x.name

SELECT x.cd, x.d FROM (SELECT data->'customerDetails' AS cd, data->'description' AS d, (json_array_elements(data->'description') ->> 'price')::int AS price FROM public.invoice_binary) AS x WHERE x.price > 8500
